title.narrative: Financing Low Carbon Strategies in Forest Landscapes

description.narrative: Create a dedicated financing line to REDD+ through Financiera Rural, a public financial institution focused on rural development, to improve community access to finance for low-carbon activities in forest landscapes

participating-org.narrative: Inter-American Development Bank, Inter-American Investment Corporation and Multilateral Investment Fund

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
